solution_line_template: The firewood is made from {total_firewood_pieces} pieces of firewood / {pieces_per_log} pieces of firewood per log = <<{total_firewood_pieces}/{pieces_per_log}={total_logs}>>{total_logs} logs.
So the logs are chopped from {total_logs} logs / {logs_per_tree} logs per tree = <<{total_logs}/{logs_per_tree}={total_trees}>>{total_trees} trees.
